Table 'AlphaTable' 6-max Seat #4 is the button
Seat 2: Amy Adams ($591 in chips)
Seat 3: Billy ($439 in chips)
Seat 4: Chris ($354.10 in chips)
Seat 5: Dave ($834.45 in chips)
Seat 6: Edwin ($275 in chips)
Dave: posts small blind $5
Edwin: posts big blind $10
*** HOLE CARDS ***
Amy Adams: calls $10
Billy: folds
Chris: folds
Dave: folds
Edwin: checks
*** FLOP *** [6h 7s 5h]
Edwin: bets $20
Amy Adams: calls $20
*** TURN *** [6h 7s 5h] [3s]
Edwin: checks
Amy Adams: checks
*** RIVER *** [6h 7s 5h 3s] [Td]
Edwin: bets $40
Amy Adams: raises $80 to $120
Edwin: calls $80
*** SHOW DOWN ***
Amy Adams: shows [Qh 4c] (a straight, Three to Seven)
Edwin: shows [7d 4s] (a straight, Three to Seven)
Edwin collected $151.50 from pot
Amy Adams collected $151.50 from pot
*** SUMMARY ***
Total pot $305 | Rake $2
Board [6h 7s 5h 3s Td]
Seat 2: Amy Adams showed [Qh 4c] and won ($151.50) with a straight, Three to Seven
